alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette and eastern Dixie Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Ichetucknee Spring to 8 miles southeast of Fowlers Bluff. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Suwannee, Shamrock, Cross City Airport, Old Town, Grady, Hatch Bend, Eugene, Fletcher, Guaranto Springs, Yellow Jacket and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
